original_text: All the king's officers and the rulers and leaders of each region decided to help the Jews. They did that because they were afraid of Mordecai's power.
korean_text: 각 지방 모든 지방관과 대신들과 총독들과 왕의 사무를 보는 자들이 모르드개를 두려워하므로 다 유다인을 도우니

sentences.original_text: and the rulers and leaders of each region
because they were afraid of Mordecai's power
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 모르드개의 권세를 두려워했기 때문이다
